All Classes

Class
Description
Brand
Specifies a Brand enumeration with an also fixed name specification.
CashRegisterManagement
Represents an inventory of a certain DrinkSale history.
CashRegisterRandomizer
A helper class for filling the CashRegisterManagement implementation with random information (mainly for demonstration purposes, but also created out of sheer fun :D).
Cocktail
Describes a Cocktail object (with data access) and offers manipulation options.
Drink
Abstract base class for concrete Drink classes.
DrinkSale
Represent a sale of a particular drink, including information about price, the operator who fulfilled the sale and the timestamp stating when the sale happened.
DrinkUtils
A little helper class containing utility methods used throughout the Drinks project.
Fruit
Specifies a Fruit class storing the name of the Fruit.
IDrinkSpecification
Represents a little extension for Drink class(es).
Liquid
Represents a Liquid which can be used in Drinks.
LongDrink
Describes a LongDrink object, with methods to calculate Volume/alcoholic percentage.
Main
Contains the main application logic.
Operator
Represents an Operator / person, who is capable of selling Drinks to customers.
SimpleDrink
Represents a SimpleDrink with a Liquid which can be used in drinks.
Smoothie
Describes a Smoothie object.
SoftLiquid
Mainly used as a mixing fluid.
Tea
Describes a Tea object.
ValidationException
Just a wrapper / nice-to-have class.
